summary: Defines the core abstract infrastructure for Djangoâ€™s serialization system, including base classes for serializers and deserializers, error types for serialization/deserialization failures, a container for deserialized objects with related data, and a simple progress indicator. It also provides utilities for constructing model instances from raw data.
business_intent: Establish a flexible, extensible framework that enables converting Django model objects to various serialized representations and reconstructing them back, while handling errors, managing related objects, and optionally reporting progress.
